description: 1 x Sycamore (T1 rear west corner): reduce crown by 3m in height and up to 2m laterally, to suitable branch junctions in order to maintain a flowing canopy outline.  1 x Lime (T2 rear eastern boundary):  Crown reduce to previous, most recent reduction points retaining selected shortened furnishing growth at points of reduction. 1 x Sycamore (T3 rear eastern boundary): Crown reduce to previous, most recent reduction points, retaining selected shortened furnishing growth at points of reduction.1 x Pear tree (T4 rear garden). Remove minor trunk epicormic growth to 3m from ground level1 x Tree of heaven (T7 front): Reduce crown by up to 2 m all round to suitable branch junctions to maintain a flowing oval canopy outline.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: work in accordance with British Standard
